answers.answer: Have you had an MRI? It could be a pinched nerve from a disk bulge. It could be muscle spasms. If it is nerve pain, there are medicines (like lyrica) that can help.

question: I have a burning pain in my neck so painfull it hurts to touch it. title: help me neck pain
